mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_ssm_sales(sales_id, purchase_id, store_id, employee_id, sales_amount, sales_date) VALUES (#{salesId}, #{purchaseId}, #{storeId}, NULL, #{salesAmount}, NULL)
INSERT INTO tb_ssm_sales_detail(sales_id, goods_id, sales_quantity, sales_status) VALUES (#{salesId}, #{goodsId}, #{salesQuantity}, #{salesStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT s.sales_id AS salesId, s.purchase_id AS purchaseId, sd.goods_id AS goodsId, s.employee_id AS employeeId, s.sales_amount AS salesAmount, s.sales_date AS salesDate, sd.sales_quantity AS salesQuantity FROM tb_ssm_sales s, tb_ssm_sales_detail sd WHERE s.sales_id=sd.sales_id AND s.store_id=#{storeId} AND sd.sales_status=#{salesStatus}

SELECT s.sales_id AS salesId, s.purchase_id AS purchaseId, sd.sales_quantity AS salesQuantity, sd.sales_status AS salesStatus FROM tb_ssm_sales s, tb_ssm_sales_detail sd WHERE s.sales_id=sd.sales_id AND s.purchase_id=#{purchaseId}
